exclusion: Enter management mode  by push all four buttons together for one second - green led blinks slowly), hit button 3 ( enter primary controller functions - green led blinks faster) and then button 3 again.
inclusion: When in factory default push Button 3 (secure) or Button 4 (normal) for one second to enter inclusion mode. The inclusion mode is indicated by a blinking green LED. From second device on you need to enter management mode  push all four buttons together for one second - green led blinks slowly), hit button 3 ( enter primary controller functions - green led blinks faster) and then button 1 (secure) or button 2 (normal).
overview:
The Secure Key Fob Controller is a 4 button Z-Wave device capable to act both as primary or secondary controller. The four buttons can control other Z-Wave devices such as switches, dimmer and even door locks directly. Various options - configurable by Z-Wave configuration commands - define the actions and the commands used for this control. It is possible to use two sets of buttons (one of on/open/up and one for off/closed/down) or 4 single buttons to control 4 different groups of devices.

The controller also allows triggering scenes in a central controller. Again different modes can be configured to adapt to the various implementations of scenes in different central controllers in the market.

Control options also include special modes like "all on/off" or always controlling the Z-Wave device in proximity to the fob.
wakeup: Enter management mode  by push all four buttons together for one second - green led blinks slowly), then hit button 2 .

category.label: Remote Control
category.description: Any portable or hand-held device that controls the status of something, e.g. remote control, keyfob etc.

parameters.label: Button 1 and 3 pair mode
parameters.description: In separate mode button 1 works with Group A, button 3 with Group C.
parameters.overview: In separate mode button 1 works with Group A, button 3 with Group C. Click is ON, Hold is dimming UP, Double click is OFF, Click-Hold is dimming DOWN. In pair button 1/3 are UP/DOWN correspondingly. Click is ON/OFF, Hold is dimming UP/DOWN. Single clicks works with Group A, double click with Group C

parameters.label: Button 2 and 4 pair mode
parameters.description: In separate mode button 2 works with group B, button 4 with group D.
parameters.overview: In separate mode button 2 works with control group B, button 4 with control group D. Click is ON, Hold is dimming UP, Double click is OFF, Click-Hold is dimming DOWN. In pair button B/D are UP/DOWN correspondingly. Click is ON/OFF, Hold is dimming UP/DOWN. Single clicks works with Group B, double click with Group D.

parameters.label: Command to control Group A
parameters.description: This parameter defines the command to be sent to devices of control group A
parameters.overview: This parameter defines the command to be sent to devices of control group A when the related button is pressed.

parameters.label: Command to control Group B
parameters.description: This parameter defines the command to be sent to devices of control group B
parameters.overview: This parameter defines the command to be sent to devices of control group B when the related button is pressed.

parameters.label: Command to control Group C
parameters.description: This parameter defines the command to be sent to devices of control group C
parameters.overview: This parameter defines the command to be sent to devices of control group C when the related button is pressed.

parameters.label: Command to control Group D
parameters.description: This parameter defines the command to be sent to devices of control group D
parameters.overview: This parameter defines the command to be sent to devices of control group D when the related button is pressed.

parameters.label: Send the following Switch All commands
Blocks wake up even when Wake Up Interval is set
parameters.description: Blocks wake up even when Wake Up Interval is set
parameters.overview: If the KFOB wakes up and there is no controller nearby, several unsuccessful communication attempts will drain battery.

options.label: Wake up is possible if configured accordingly

parameters.label: Send unsolicited Battery Report on Wake Up
parameters.description: Send unsolicited Battery Report on Wake Up
parameters.overview: If the KFOB wakes up and there is no controller nearby, several unsuccessful communication attempts will drain battery. Value

options.label: To same node as wake up notification

associations.label: Control Group A
associations.overview: controlled by button 1 or single clicks of buttons 1 and 3

associations.label: Control Group B
associations.overview: controlled by button 2 or single clicks of buttons 2 and 4

associations.label: Control Group C
associations.overview: controlled by button 3 or double clicks of buttons 1 and 3

associations.label: Control Group D
associations.overview: controlled by button 4 or double clicks of buttons 2 and 4
